#include<stdio.h>
unsigned long long gcd(unsigned long long a,unsigned long long b)
{
    if(a%b==0) return b;
    else gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    unsigned  long long a,b,tmp;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%llu%llu",&a,&b);
        if(b>a)
        {
            tmp=b;
            b=a;
            a=tmp;
        }
        a=a/gcd(a,b)-2;
        printf("%llu\n",a);
    }
    return 0;
}
